product_name: PATC Hikes in the Washington Region: Part B, Northern Virginia Counties - 4th Edition
long_description: This edition of. Editors: Philip J. Stone, John A. Bennett and David W. Pierce. Softcover; 130 pages; black-and-white maps and photographs. Potomac Appalachian Trail Club; copyright 2007.
short_description: This edition of Hikes in the Washington Region is an outstanding guide for short day hikes in Arlington, Fairfax, Loudoun and Prince William counties in Virginia.
